page.content: {The Derry Journal} is situated on the Buncrana Road. It is published on { {Tuesdays and Fridays.} There are 26.5 thousand papers sold on Friday and 16 thousand sold on Tuesday. The Friday edition costs 25p and the Tuesday edition costs 15p. {Most readers} live in{Derry City} and North {County {Donegal.} The Journal employs a staff of {30} people altogether. There are {3 male {reporters} and two female reporters.
